# Opportunity link click

This table shows the number of unique people that clicked each "opportunity link" (https://activategood.org/opportunity/####) in the newsletters. Click the title of the link to go to the opportunity page.

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(knitr)
# library(kableExtra)
load("../link_df.RData")

# try fixing hyperlinks

link_df$title = paste0("__[", link_df$title, "]", "(", link_df$link, ")__")

link_df = link_df[c("title", "dates_sent", "click count")]

names(link_df) = c("Title", "Dates Sent", "Click Count")

kable(link_df)

```
